      • normalPDF

        public static double normalPDF(double z)
        Probability density function for a normalized gaussian distribution
        Parameters:
        z - your normalized value (val - mean)/(standard deviation)
        Returns:
        relative frequency of getting z

      • normalCDF

        public static double normalCDF(double z)
        Cumulative density function for a normalized gaussian distribution Returns area under the curve between -infinity and z of the gaussian (aka normal) curve
        Parameters:
        z - normalized value (val - mean) / stdDev
        Returns:
        probability of getting a value of z or less

      • tPDF

        public static double tPDF(double t,
                          double df)
        Probability density function for a student's t distribution.
        Parameters:
        t - your normalized test statistic
        df - degrees of freedom
        Returns:
        relative frequency of getting t

      • tCDF

        public static double tCDF(double t,
                          double df)
        Cumulative density function for a student's t distribution.
        Parameters:
        t - your normalized test statistic
        df - degrees of freedom
        Returns:
        area under standard t curve between -infinity and t

      • oldRound

        public static double oldRound(double num)
        For the sake of scaling, this method eats up a decimal and returns another decimal that is one of the following: 1 * 10^n 2 * 10^n 2.5 * 10^n 5 * 10^n
        Parameters:
        num - the scaling that you want to use
        Returns:
        new scaling that follows Dr. Rocklin's graph scaling guidelines

        Just a tester class that isn't very important

        args - unused
